About page

This page tells you a little bit about me.

Privacy Policy

We here at Material Style respect your privacy and we value your trust in us. Your privacy is of extreme importance to us and we are always committed to safeguarding it.

What personal data we collect and why we collect it.

Material Style does not collect any personal information about you such as your name, address, phone number or email ID without your knowledge.
When you provide your email ID while posting a feedback, we never share it with anyone. Your email ID will only be used for responding to your feedback if requested and will never be made publicly available.
When you leave a feedback on the site, we collect the data shown in the feedback form. We don't associate IP addresses with feedback or store them.

Who we share your data with.

We do not share or sell any personal data with anyone.

How long we retain your data.

If you leave a feedback, the feedback, your name and email ID are retained indefinitely until we manually remove it.

Changes to privacy policy.

Although most changes are likely to be minor, we may change our privacy policy from time to time, and at our sole discretion. If we decide to make changes to our privacy policy, we'll post those changes on this page. We encourage visitors to periodically check this page to ensure you are familiar with the most current version. Your continued use of this site after any change in this privacy policy will constitute your acceptance of such change.
